article: The city zoo bought a new kangaroo from Australia . It was famous for jumping very high . The zoo keeper was worried that the kangaroo would run away . He built special walls around it . But the next morning , people found that the animal was playing around outside . So the zoo keeper made the height of the walls 5 metres . But the kangaroo got out again the following day . The zoo keeper felt very angry , so he made the walls as high as lo metres , but the kangaroo still got out . " How high do you think he ' ll keep on building the walls ? " a giraffe asked the kangaroo . " I do n ' t know , " said the kangaroo . " Maybe they ' ll reach 300 metres . It all depends on whether he remembers to lock the gate . "
questions: What did the zoo keeper do to stop the kangaroo from going out ?

human: He did n ' t give the kangaroo food .
